SEARCH:
Package datastorage

Klasse DAOimp<T>

java.lang.Object
datastorage.DAOimp<T>
Typparameter:
T - The type of the entity to be managed by the DAO.
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
DAO<T>
Bekannte direkte Unterklassen:
CaregiverDAO, LoginDAO, PatientDAO, TreatmentDAO
public abstract class DAOimp<T> extends Object implements DAO<T>
The DAOimp class is an abstract class that provides the basic implementation of a Data Access Object (DAO). It implements the common CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations for a specific entity type. Subclasses need to implement the abstract methods to provide the specific SQL statements and object mapping.
